The lawsuit was filed by a local busines: Mario Kiezi, who owns a liquor store located in the same parking lot as the Chick-fil-A restaurant.
The lawsuit claims that the long drive: thru lines at Chick-fil-A are creating an unsafe environment in the parking lot, affecting the traffic flow and potentially blocking other parked cars from leaving.
The local news outlet: WTOL-TV, reported on the lawsuit and provided video evidence of the long lines and their impact on the parking lot.
The general manager of Bulk Beverage: a business located in the shopping plaza behind Chick-fil-A, expressed concerns about the long lines affecting parking for other businesses and creating an unsafe environment.
